attributes.action: Ban resales of Record Store Day Items for 3 years
attributes.additional_details:
The record culture is under attack buy sharks who buy a record for the only purpose of selling it for profit.

What I propose is a ban of resales of these 'special releases' on record store day to deter these people.

This protects the true fans and gives them a fighting chance of buying what they want.

Ebay for example would not be able to list them for 3 years from its release. This will be governed by people on the site reporting it.

Please help this culture and movement.
Support the true fans!
